title: LFT Casual Ranked 5's for fun and rewards.
body:
Hi all,

Looking to make/join a team with the intention of getting the end of season rewards. Nothing too serious.

I'm 19yo, currently at uni in Perth and will finish on the 30th Nov, so after that I should be free most of the time to play for the team. My role preferences from favourite to least favourite are support, adc, jg, top, mid. In silver 5 right now but I don't play a lot of ranked. My norms elo is somewhere around gold 3 if that means anything. I do have skype for communicating etc.

Hmu if you're interested in making a team/looking for another member.

Cheers,

Geoff

replies.body: looking for a group to climb out of b5 with open to any role except adc
I'm also at uni, finishing soon. Top, Mid and Adc. Learning more jungle and supp. Work better on a team than solo. Main Ezreal (AP) on mid.

Hey thanks for the link!
I'll be glad to join the team :)
As i said before I'm a midlane main can play all roles to a moderate standard.
I'm also used to playing against Gold's, Plats and the occasional Diamonds so i know how you feel bro xD
I'll add you on league and hopefully we can arrange something from there on{{item:2009}} 
Hope to see you soon :)
I'd be interested to join, silver 4 jg main, but i can play top decently
Hey I'm currently in S3. I main top/jg. I'd be keen to join your team.

Hi i wanted to join your team if u make one. Please invite me (uniucky).
Im bronze 2 trying to climb to silver before end of season. My norm elo around silver 2-1. I main supp and top but i can play jungle as well as long as its a tank.

Im still in uni so i only can play at night from 9 onwards
